featured.text: A lot of ancient civilizations, __(37)__ the Egyptians, Hindus, Greeks, and Mayans, have left writings and __(38)__ which indicate contacts with superior beings “from the stars.”

definition.zh_def: 印度教徒，信奉印度教的人。
definition.en_def: Followers of Hinduism, a major religion originating from the Indian subcontinent.
definition.example: Many Hindus celebrate Diwali as a festival of lights.
